item.title: Android bitmap conversion
item.description: We can enhance AndroidGraphicFactory.convertToBitmap to support also custom Paint (e.g. with ColorFilter) at conversion from Drawable to Bitmap.

item.contents: We can enhance AndroidGraphicFactory.convertToBitmap to support also custom Paint (e.g. with ColorFilter) at conversion from Drawable to Bitmap.

I pushed on dev a new implementation supporting input Paint for custom bitmap conversion.
This is demonstrated in Samples ChangingBitmaps example, using only one drawable and changing its color.
